Articles.Content:
Hello everyone! I would like to introduce my first simple and fun mission about Kerbin community.

Briefing: 

So, our martketers decided to start flights for tourists. We developed an uniq cheap rocket with solid fuel that can be returned back by parachutes.

But there is one "but"! The first tourist is Kerbin President Mr. Vondelf Kerman!

We need to show us for everyone as the best space company (I know there is only one space company on Kerbin).
Oh... that stupid marketers...



 

Download Here
Looks like a fun challenge that I might try sometime tonight, great job!

I have to admit, when I first read the title, I thought to myself, "Hmmm... sounds kind of political..."  

Then I read the actual challenge, and totally changed my mind... This is hilarious!!! 

I'm heading out for the afternoon, but I think I'll give this one a try later this evening.
